```json
{
  "schema_version": 1,
  "responses": [
    {
      "surface_id": "--bool",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_behavior_scenario",
        "argv": ["--type=bool", "--bool"]
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "--bool-or-int",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_behavior_scenario",
        "argv": ["--type=bool-or-int", "--bool-or-int"]
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "--edit",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_exclusion",
        "reason_code": "requires_interactive_tty",
        "note": "Requires interactive editor to launch for editing config"
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "--null",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_behavior_scenario",
        "argv": ["--null"]
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "--path",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_behavior_scenario",
        "argv": ["--type=path", "--path"]
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "--type",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_value_examples",
        "value_examples": ["bool", "int", "bool-or-int", "path", "expiry-date", "duration"]
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "-e",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_exclusion",
        "reason_code": "requires_interactive_tty",
        "note": "Requires interactive editor to launch for editing config"
      }
    },
    {
      "surface_id": "-f",
      "action": {
        "kind": "add_behavior_scenario",
        "argv": ["-f", "/tmp/test_config"],
        "seed": {
          "files": {}
        }
      }
    }
  ]
}
```
